message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let's see if we can work something out.

I understand that $9,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,500 and $11,000, which is $10,250. This is my final offer in this range.
